author: lzybkr
body: This is my first cut at coding guidelines.  I expect feedback, hopefully I'm not suggesting anything too controversial.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Travis failure looks like an unreliable test https://travis-ci.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/jobs/45849628#L2944

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Very good document!
I left all my comments above. Some of them could be ignored.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Test failure:

```
[-] Should have matching output when using the Start switch vs piping from another cmdlet 67ms

```

comments.body: Can't comment on the coding guidelines, but the issue labels were exactly what I needed. Anyone blocked on merging?
